sys_update_xml.name: sys_graphql_schema_8c19a7851b8301106c7399f7b04bcbfa
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_graphql_schema"><sys_graphql_schema action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><application_namespace>x723649</application_namespace><enforce_acl/><name>Change</name><namespace>change</namespace><paths>Change:assignment_group,Change:category,Change:change_tasks,Change:id,Change:impact,Change:number,Change:priority,Change:problems,Change:requested_by,Change:risk,Change:service,Change:short_description,ChangeTasks:cmdb_ci,ChangeTasks:id,ChangeTasks:number,ConfigurationItem:id,ConfigurationItem:name,ConfigurationItem:number,ConfigurationItem:type,Group:description,Group:id,Group:manager,Group:name,Problems:description,Problems:id,Problems:impact,Problems:number,Query:getChangeRequestByID,Service:business_criticality,Service:id,Service:name,User:first_name,User:id,User:title,User:user_name</paths><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><schema>schema {
    query: Query
}

type Query {
   getChangeRequestByID(table: String! = "change_request", id: ID!): Change
}

type Change{
	id: ID! @source(value: "sys_id.value")
	number: String @source(value: "number.display_value")
	requested_by(table: String = "sys_user"): User @source(value: "requested_by.value")
	category: String @source(value: "category.display_value")
	service(table: String = "cmdb_ci_service"): Service @source(value: "business_service.value")
	priority: String @source(value: "priority.display_value")
	risk: String @source(value: "risk.display_value")
	impact: String @source(value: "impact.display_value")
	short_description: String @source(value: "short_description.display_value")
	assignment_group(table: String = "sys_user_group"): Group @source(value: "assignment_group.value")
	change_tasks(table: String = "change_task", fieldname: String = "change_request" ): [ChangeTasks] @source(value: "sys_id.value")
	problems(table: String = "problem", fieldname: String = "change_request"): [Problems] @source(value: "change_request.value")
}

type User{
	id: ID! @source(value: "sys_id.value")
	user_name: String @source(value: "user_name.display_value")
	first_name: String @source(value: "first_name.display_value")
	title: String @source(value: "title.display_value")
}

type Service{
	id: ID! @source(value: "sys_id.value")
	name: String @source(value: "name.display_value")
	business_criticality: String @source(value: "busines_criticality.display_value")
}

type Group{
	id: ID! @source(value: "sys_id.value")
	name: String @source(value: "name.display_value")
	description: String @source(value: "description.display_value")
	manager(table: String = "sys_user"): User @source(value: "manager.value")
}

type ChangeTasks{
	id: ID! @source(value: "sys_id.value")
	number: String @source(value: "number.display_value")
	cmdb_ci(table: String = "cmdb_ci"): ConfigurationItem @source(value: "cmdb_ci.value")
	
}
type ConfigurationItem{
	id: ID! @source(value: "sys_id.value")
	number: String @source(value: "number.display_value")
	name: String @source(value: "name.display_value")
	type: String @source(value: "type.display_value")
}



type  Problems{
	 id: ID! @source(value: "sys_id.value")
	 # change_request(table: String = "change_request"): Change @source(value: "sys_id.value")
	 number: String @source(value: "number.display_value")
	 impact: String @source(value: "impact.display_value")
	 description: String @source(value: "description.display_value")
}

</schema><sys_class_name>sys_graphql_schema</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-22 18:24:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c19a7851b8301106c7399f7b04bcbfa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>54</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Change</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_graphql_schema_8c19a7851b8301106c7399f7b04bcbfa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 15:49:02</sys_updated_on><type_names/></sys_graphql_schema></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_graphql_resolver_ba761cd91b4701106c7399f7b04bcbd5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_graphql_resolver"><sys_graphql_resolver action="DELETE"><name>getContactsFromM2M</name><schema display_value="Change">8c19a7851b8301106c7399f7b04bcbfa</schema><script><![CDATA[(function process( /*ResolverEnvironment*/ env) {

    var id = env.getSource();
    var table = env.getArguments().table;
	var fieldname = env.getArguments().fieldname;
	var contactIDs = [];

    var rec = new GlideRecord(table);
    rec.addQuery(fieldname, id);
    if (env.getArguments().filter != null) {
        rec.addEncodedQuery('' + env.getArguments().filter);
    }
    rec.query();
    while (rec.next()) {
		contactIDs.push(''+rec.pid_contact);
//         var contact = rec.pid_contact.getRefRecord();
//         //gs.info("This is the contact" + JSON.stringify(contact));
//         var obj = {
//             'sys_id': contact.getUniqueValue(),
// 			'first_name': contact.getDisplayValue('first_name'),
// 			'last_name': contact.getDisplayValue('last_name'),
// 			'active': contact.getDisplayValue('active'),
// 			'active_ch': contact.getDisplayValue('active_ch'),
// 			'cell': contact.getDisplayValue('cell'),
// 			'phone': contact.getDisplayValue('phone'),
//             'sys_created_by': contact.getDisplayValue('sys_created_by'),
//             'sys_created_on': contact.getDisplayValue('sys_created_on'),
//             'sys_updated_by': contact.getDisplayValue('sys_updated_by'),
//             'sys_updated_on': contact.getDisplayValue('sys_updated_on'),
//         };
//         //gs.info(JSON.stringify(obj));
//         results.push(obj);
    }
	
	var contacts = new GlideRecord('chage_task');
	if (contactIDs.length > 0) {
		contacts.addEncodedQuery('sys_idIN'+contactIDs.join(','));
	} else {
		contacts.addEncodedQuery('sys_idINnone');
	}
	contacts.query();

    return contacts;

})(env);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_graphql_resolver</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-22 21:42:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>ba761cd91b4701106c7399f7b04bcbd5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getContactsFromM2M</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_graphql_resolver_ba761cd91b4701106c7399f7b04bcbd5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-22 21:42:56</sys_updated_on></sys_graphql_resolver></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_graphql_resolver_91baab091b8301106c7399f7b04bcb4d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_graphql_resolver"><sys_graphql_resolver action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>getRecordByID</name><schema display_value="Change">8c19a7851b8301106c7399f7b04bcbfa</schema><script><![CDATA[(function process(/*ResolverEnvironment*/ env) {
	
	var id = env.getArguments().id;
	var table = env.getArguments().table;
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
	gr.get(id);
	return gr;

})(env);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_graphql_resolver</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-22 18:31:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>91baab091b8301106c7399f7b04bcb4d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRecordByID</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_graphql_resolver_91baab091b8301106c7399f7b04bcb4d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-22 18:34:46</sys_updated_on></sys_graphql_resolver></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_graphql_resolver_57b5d8991b4701106c7399f7b04bcb87
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_graphql_resolver"><sys_graphql_resolver action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>getRecordByField</name><schema display_value="Change">8c19a7851b8301106c7399f7b04bcbfa</schema><script><![CDATA[(function process( /*ResolverEnvironment*/ env) {

    var id = env.getSource();
    var table = env.getArguments().table;
	var queryField = env.getArguments().fieldname;

    var rec = new GlideRecord(table);
    rec.addQuery(queryField, id);
    rec.query();

    return rec;

})(env);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_graphql_resolver</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-22 21:39:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>57b5d8991b4701106c7399f7b04bcb87</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRecordByField</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_graphql_resolver_57b5d8991b4701106c7399f7b04bcb87</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 14:30:54</sys_updated_on></sys_graphql_resolver></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_graphql_resolver_e87158551b4701106c7399f7b04bcb53
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_graphql_resolver"><sys_graphql_resolver action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>getRecordsByParentID</name><schema display_value="Change">8c19a7851b8301106c7399f7b04bcbfa</schema><script><![CDATA[(function process( /*ResolverEnvironment*/ env) {

    var id = env.getSource();
    var parent = env.getArguments().parent || 'parent';
    var table = env.getArguments().table;
	
    var grt = new GlideRecord(table);
    grt.addQuery(parent, id);
    if (env.getArguments().filter != null) {
        grt.addEncodedQuery('' + env.getArguments().filter);
    }
    grt.query();
    return grt;


})(env);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_graphql_resolver</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-22 21:27:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>e87158551b4701106c7399f7b04bcb53</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRecordsByParentID</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_graphql_resolver_e87158551b4701106c7399f7b04bcb53</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-22 21:27:09</sys_updated_on></sys_graphql_resolver></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_graphql_resolver"><sys_graphql_resolver action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>getRecordBySourceID</name><schema display_value="Change">8c19a7851b8301106c7399f7b04bcbfa</schema><script><![CDATA[(function process(/*ResolverEnvironment*/ env) {

	var id = env.getSource();
	var table = env.getArguments().table;
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
	gr.get(id);
	gs.info(gr);
	return gr;
    

})(env);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_graphql_resolver</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-22 18:45:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>cedb2b851b8301106c7399f7b04bcb98</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRecordBySourceID</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_graphql_resolver_cedb2b851b8301106c7399f7b04bcb98</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-22 19:05:26</sys_updated_on></sys_graphql_resolver></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_graphql_resolver_27e2d2421b4b05106c7399f7b04bcb7e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_graphql_resolver"><sys_graphql_resolver action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>getRecordsfromM2M</name><schema display_value="Change">8c19a7851b8301106c7399f7b04bcbfa</schema><script><![CDATA[(function process( /*ResolverEnvironment*/ env) {

    var id = env.getSource();
    var table = env.getArguments().table;
	var fieldname = env.getArguments().fieldname;
	var problemIDs = [];

    var rec = new GlideRecord(table);
    rec.addQuery(fieldname, id);
    if (env.getArguments().filter != null) {
        rec.addEncodedQuery('' + env.getArguments().filter);
    }
    rec.query();
    return rec;

})(env);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_graphql_resolver</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 14:42:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>27e2d2421b4b05106c7399f7b04bcb7e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRecordsfromM2M</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_graphql_resolver_27e2d2421b4b05106c7399f7b04bcb7e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 14:45:56</sys_updated_on></sys_graphql_resolver></record_update>
